title: Why the Good Fight creators are glad they moved from CBS to streaming
description:
Like other big deal TV creators, Robert and Michelle King are thriving in the streaming era. The duo behind the long-running CBS show The Good Wife is making two shows for Paramount+, with more on the way. As The Good Fight - a Good Wife spinoff - enters its sixth and final season, Recode’s Peter Kafka talks to the Kings about the move from broadcast to streaming, and why they spend a lot of time tweaking the Trump administration, but less talking about the pandemic. Plus: a very costly Bitcoin miscalculation.

Featuring: Michelle & Robert King (@RKing618), TV Writers & Show Runners
Host: Peter Kafka (@pkafka), Senior Editor at Recode
